name: Bar Hop
description:
Bar Hop is rhythm game inspired by the arcade classic Frogger. Your goal is to hop to the bar and back without getting hit or falling in the river 7 days in a row. Naturally the game becomes more challenging with each day. You get points for each hop towards your goal, reaching the bar, getting back home and every coin you collect on the way.

Created by Hannes Flor, Jan Lachnit and Wiebke Scholz

All assets except the font, but including most of the music and sound effects created by us during the #NoticeMe Game Jam
